attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Get a single protected tag or wildcard protected tag

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the tag or wildcard

apis.name: Protect repository tags
apis.description: Protects a single repository tag or several project repository tags using a wildcard protected tag.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the tag or wildcard

attributes.name: create_access_level
attributes.description: Access levels allowed to create (defaults: 40, Maintainer role)

attributes.name: allowed_to_create
attributes.description: Array of access levels allowed to create tags, with each described by a hash of the form {user_id: integer}, {group_id: integer}, or {access_level: integer}

apis.name: Unprotect repository tags
apis.description: Unprotects the given protected tag or wildcard protected tag.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user
